tv.amwa.maj.meta.impl

Class RootImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • tv.amwa.maj.meta.impl.RootImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, MetadataObject, Root

    @MediaClass(uuid1=218169601,
            uuid2=768,
            uuid3=0,
            uuid4={6,14,43,52,2,6,1,1},
            definedName="Root",
            symbol="Root",
            description="Represents the logical association of the definitions of the extensions used in a file with the structural and descriptive metadata in the file.",
            namespace="http://www.smpte-ra.org/schemas/2001-2/2007/aaf",
            prefix="aaf")
public class RootImpl
extends Object
implements Root, Cloneable, Serializable, MetadataObject

        Description copied from interface: Root

      • removeRootExtension

        @MediaPropertyRemove(value="RootExtensions")
public boolean removeRootExtension(ExtensionScheme extensionScheme)
                                                                         throws NullPointerException
        Description copied from interface: Root

        Remove the given extension scheme from the set of extension schemes of this file.

        Specified by:
        removeRootExtension in interface Root
        Parameters:
        extensionScheme - Extension scheme to remove from this file.
        Returns:
        Has the extension scheme been successfully removed from this file? Returns false if the extension scheme was not contained.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Cannot remove an extension scheme using a null value.
        See Also:
        Root.removeRootExtension(AUID), Root.getRootExtensions()

        Description copied from interface: Root

        Parameters:
        rootFormatVerison - Simple integer version number of meta model.
        Throws:
